title: Cruel and unusual punishments prohibited
context: PART VIII. SENTENCES [ยง124A-81] Cruel and unusual punishments prohibited. Cruel or unusual punishment may not be adjudged by any court-martial or inflicted upon any person subject to this chapter. The use of irons, single or double, except for the purpose of safe custody, is prohibited. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2]
